post.body: OMG i love your pic!!!!!! just wanted to say lol
i like your pic, very artistic :D i dont think i would have something like it in my house though!!!! Love You ox Adele
Hiya....Just wanted to ask.....Why are you not following Frank?
he has good taste in music!!!!!
why is everyone talking about how good there English is!?!
my best friend text me before telling me...like i wouldn't know already, she only likes MCR through me!!! lol
i'll make sure i show you them pics lol!!! :D
I heard they were having a baby but you never can tell if its just a rumour.
your welcome!!!!! :D Thanks for following me too.....'26 followers in about 20 hours, lol'
Hey, hope your drive was okay!! love you!
i didn't do the animation but they're done an macromedia flash, it was hard for me to learn but i have made some funny stuff!
I send them messages all the time but haven't had a reply yet, but i will!!!!! eventually....i'm sure. lol
=D MCR is why i joined the site, i didn't even know about it untill they changed the official MCR site.....anyway,, yeah =O me too
just wanted to say hi cos this is the first time i've been online at the same time as you!!!!:D
i don't buy much from it but i have seen some funny stuff, lol, got a good pic of MCR with signed guitar picks from it though!!!!!
lol
it's really good as well if you can't get one you can always check ebay they have everything on there!
I never really got light today where i am! probably because it rained all day washing away the snow (long awaited by me) :D
http://twitpic.com/qtt0 - i won Â£100 (about $147) on this Bingo show on t.v, well my sister won and we had to split the chequ ...
nooooooooooooooooooooooo
Merry Christmas Bob :D xo Adele
Merry Christmas Ray :D xo Adele
Merry Christmas Gerard :D xo Adele
Merry Christmas Mikey :D xo Adele
Merry Christmas Frank! :D xo Adele
it should do good...Alexandra just has that song from Shrek but yours is a Christmas song!!!! hope you get the top spot! xo Adele
hiiii, you looking forward to the chart on sunday? hope you get number one! xo Adele
http://twitpic.com/tywj - looks like dangermouse!!! lol thats pretty cool Frank but gross at the same time :D xo Adele
freezing here as always (i'm from England by the way), and it is raining again...looks like no white christmas again ;( xo Adele
thanks for the follow by the way!!!!! xo Adele
hiiiiiiii hope to see you and the band around my area next time you are touring, still not been able to see you live ;( xo Adele
http://twitpic.com/t9za - Ouch!!! that happened in one of my friends bands gigs at school. Then he surfed the crowd got blood ...
Hi, love your new single!!!! listening to it now over and over and over again :D hope you get the Christmas number one!!! xo Adele
sorry about that!!!!!!!!!
lol
people keep saying MCR are gonna break up too. Stop these rumours!
OMG, been told too many times today that Gerard is having a baby, i know,
*High Fives* Everyone. i gotta go......byeeeeeeeee!!
Some guy at my college looks exactly like Mikey Way (when he wore glasses etc.) Don't know who he is or anyhting, i will sneak a pic!!
OMG Jonas Brothers is on the radio.........never mind turned my music up instead, can't hear it anymore....!
Can't believe Pete Wentz named his baby Bronx Mowgli Wentz, sounds wierd and the initials are BMW. Anyone out there really love the name?!?
Youtube 'Hamster on a piano (eating popcorn)' lol, it falls of the piano at the end, but the guy catches it.so funny, song stuck in my head!
i'm not complaining, just wanted to tell you all, even though nobody seems to be online, nobody's posting anymore, i'm talking to myself :S
The Tales of Beedle the Bard (Harry Potter book) i got the collectors edition yesterday and there are 2 spelling mistakes in it :S lol
anyone else get beedle the bard today???(or getting it soon) or am i just a geek for being so excited
wow its 9:50pm here in England!!!!
there are two spelling mistakes in the book!!!! it says 'Prmando Dippet'(pg78)instead of 'Armando Dippet' and 'Tnd' instead of 'And'(pg156)
OMG i got my tales of beedle the bard collectors edition today, it's amazing anyone else buy one?!?
i find out how it went in a couple of weeks!!!
the interview was okay, it took ages though we had to watch a video and then discuss it, write about it then have individual interviews!!
OMG got an interview at university today for a maths teaching course. I am shitting myself. i hate interviews...wish me luck!!!!
Finished college now till january yaaay :D
gotta go. see you all tomorrow!!!!!
one day left at college before i'm off for christmas...i have to go in for an hour to watch some of 'a streetcar named desire' then go home!
if you give it food, it will live, if you give it water it will die what is it....riddle i was told at college today...and i don't know!!!!!
bought Geraldine McQueen's new single today (once upon a christmas song)....if you dont know it youtube it...lol :D i love Peter Kay!!!!!
